WorkItem.Description:
Hi
Firstly I would like to thank you for your awesome job on BibWord. It really helped me out.
Secondly, I have created a referencing style based on my university's guidelines, and using your xml templates. The referencing style is a numbered style.
I would like to ask why the citations inside text boxes have different ordering than to those outside. Whenever I add a citation in a text-box, it becomes the last source in the bibliography, regardless of the order in which the citations are. For example, if I have citations A & B in text-boxes, and citation X outside a text box, the order of the bibliography becomes: 1.X 2.A 3.B
I was wondering if there is a way to fix this.
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Citation order not the same in text boxes!
